alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 19 at 3:31PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT AREAS NEAR HUNT IN SOUTHERN APACHE COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM MST... At 330 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St Johns Industrial Air Park, or near Hunt moving east at 40 to 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hunt, Saint Johns, St Johns Industrial Air Park, Concho, Mesa Parada, and Zion Reservoir. This includes the following highways... Highway 180 191 between mile markers 371 and 377. Highway 191 161 between mile markers 316 and 327. Highway 180 between mile markers 338 and 368. State Route 61 between mile markers 372 and 381. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County
